unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a "DDLJ" Twist in Delhi-NCR!**
normalised: **E V Charging Gets a "D D L J" Twist in Delhi-N C R!**

unnormalised: Delhi-NCR residents can breathe a little easier now. Forget running around like Raj looking for Simran; finding an EV charger is getting simpler. IIT Delhi just announced a pilot project deploying fast charging stations across key metro stations.
normalised: Delhi-N C R residents can breathe a little easier now. Forget running around like Raj looking for Simran; finding an E V charger is getting simpler. I I T Delhi just announced a pilot project deploying fast charging stations across key metro stations.

unnormalised: Imagine, dropping the kids off at school, heading to work, and topping up your Tata Nexon EV while waiting for the Gurgaon Rapid Metro. Talk about convenient!
normalised: Imagine, dropping the kids off at school, heading to work, and topping up your Tata Nexon E V while waiting for the Gurgaon Rapid Metro. Talk about convenient!

unnormalised: These aren't just any chargers, folks. We're talking juice stations that can give you around 80% charge in under an hour. Enough to get you to Agra for the weekend, maybe (assuming you charge along the way, of course!).
normalised: These aren't just any chargers, folks. We're talking juice stations that can give you around eighty percent charge in under an hour. Enough to get you to Agra for the weekend, maybe (assuming you charge along the way, of course!).

unnormalised: Sources say these chargers will be priced competitively, around Rs. 15-20 per unit, making them a viable option for daily commuters.
normalised: Sources say these chargers will be priced competitively, around rupees fifteen to twenty per unit, making them a viable option for daily commuters.

unnormalised: The initial phase focuses on 10 key locations with plans to expand to 50 by Diwali. So, ditch the range anxiety and embrace the electric revolution, *senorita!*
normalised: The initial phase focuses on ten key locations with plans to expand to fifty by Diwali. So, ditch the range anxiety and embrace the electric revolution, *senorita!*

unnormalised: This initiative will potentially encourage the adoption of EVs in Delhi-NCR, reducing pollution and making life easier for EV owners.
normalised: This initiative will potentially encourage the adoption of E Vs in Delhi-N C R, reducing pollution and making life easier for E V owners.
